Article Title: Red Sox's Wilyer Abreu matches early-season performance of MLB's highest-paid stars
Article Text:
Red Sox’s Wilyer Abreu matches early-season performance of MLB’s highest-paid stars (Image Source: X)

Wilyer Abreu's impressive play is compared to that of Aaron Judge and Kyle Tucker

Wilyer Abreu's development and destiny with Boston Red Sox

The Boston Red Sox have delivered a surprise superstar performance at the beginning of the 2025 MLB season. A relatively not-so-famous player earlier is now creating a sensation and being likened to some of the league's top performers. The supporters are taking notice as this athlete's incredible statistics continue to reach new heights.Boston Red Sox 26-year-old right fielder Wilyer Abreu has started the 2025 season on record-high numbers. During his first 11 games, he registered a.424 batting average, posting 14 hits in 33 at-bats. Offensively, he has logged three home runs, three doubles, and 12 run batted in (RBIs). Abreu has walked eight times, reporting a league-high on-base percentage of.537 and an on-base plus slugging (OPS) of 1.324.This type of performance places Abreu among the league's top performers. Notably, only Chicago Cubs' Kyle Tucker and New York Yankees' Aaron Judge have had a Wins Above Replacement (WAR) of 1.0 so early in the season. Tucker and Judge are famously remembered for having huge contracts as well as solid high-level performance.Aaron Judge, known for his powerful hitting, has continued to play impeccably for the Yankees. Similarly, Kyle Tucker has been an iconic player for the Cubs and has been part of their major offensive lineup. Abreu's recent performance statistics are drawing favourable comparisons with such seasoned stars as he highlights the potential contribution towards the Red Sox's season.Wilyer Abreu 's journey here has been one of steady development and resolve. After being acquired by the Boston Red Sox from the Houston Astros in a trade on August 1, 2022, Abreu worked on honing his skills in the minor leagues. Abreu debuted in the Major Leagues on August 22, 2023, and played in 28 games that season, batting.316 with two home runs and 14 RBIs.In the 2024 season, Abreu's playing time expanded as he played in 132 games, with 106 of them being right field starts. He ended the season with a batting average of.253, and 15 home runs and 58 RBIs. His defense was recognized with the Fielding Bible Award and the American League Gold Glove Award for right fielders.Abreu's offseason work ethic and dedication obviously came in handy, as evidenced by his amazing first half of the 2025 campaign. His new plate discipline is particularly astounding, with eight walks and six strikeouts to date, a welcome change from the 125 strikeouts and 40 walks of last year.Even if it is uncertain whether Abreu can maintain this level of performance for the entire season, his early production has been a large reason why the Red Sox have been successful. Pundits and fans alike will be keeping their eyes on what becomes of his season and whether he can keep up with the play of established stars like Aaron Judge and Kyle Tucker.Also Read: Red Sox's Jarren Duran Shares Emotional Journey Through Depression And Recovery In New Netflix Documentary
Article Summary: Boston red sox right fielder wilyer abreu has started the 2025 season on record-high numbers. During his first 11 games, he registered a.424 batting average, posting 14 hits in 33 at-bats. Only chicago cubs' kyle tucker and new york yankees' aaron judge have had a wins above replacement (war) of 1.0 so early in the season.

Article Title: “Travis Kelce breaks up with Taylor Swift”: Internet explodes with false breakup rumors as the power couple secretly go off-grid
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

What sparked the Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift breakup rumors?

Sources say the couple is “still very much together and in love”

In recent days, social media has been buzzing with rumors suggesting that Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift may have called it quits. The trending phrase “Travis Kelce breaks up with Taylor Swift” quickly made its rounds online, sparking concern among fans. However, sources close to the couple have stepped in to set the record straight — the power couple is still very much together.The speculation began after both Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift noticeably stepped back from the public eye following a whirlwind few months. After the Kansas City Chiefs lost the Super Bowl to the Philadelphia Eagles in February, and with Swift wrapping up the final leg of her record-breaking Eras Tour and attending the Grammys, fans noticed a lack of appearances and updates. This silence was enough to ignite rumors of a possible split.But insiders familiar with the couple’s dynamic have confirmed that the rumors are nothing more than unfounded speculation. The two are still going strong, choosing instead to prioritize rest and downtime after months of demanding schedules.According to a source quoted by US Weekly, “Taylor and Travis are doing great, and they’re still very much together and in love. They’re just taking a break from the public eye. They’re enjoying some R&R after working their butts off, making the most of their time off.” This insight gives fans a clearer picture of what’s really going on — not a breakup, but a much-needed pause from constant public scrutiny.The same source added that both stars are seeking a more grounded lifestyle following months of nonstop media attention, viral moments, and career obligations. “They’re looking to enjoy a ‘normal life’ after some chaotic past months,” the source explained.Despite their effort to stay low-key, the couple’s past outings — from romantic dinners to music festivals — continue to make waves online. A clip from Coachella 2024 recently resurfaced, showing Kelce and Swift walking hand-in-hand, radiating ease and affection.Also Read: Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift savor quiet moments together, amid uncertain future together So, while the internet may be quick to jump to conclusions, fans can breathe easy knowing that this Hollywood-meets-NFL romance is still thriving, just away from the spotlight for now.
Article Summary: Travis kelce and taylor swift are “still very much together and in love,” a source said. The couple is taking a break from the public eye to enjoy some r&r, the source added. Both stars are seeking a more grounded lifestyle following months of nonstop media attention.

Article Title: Cody Bellinger misses Yankees game after food poisoning from bad wings
Article Text:
Cody Bellinger misses Yankees game after food poisoning from bad wings (Image Source: X)

Cody Bellinger gets ill after consuming chicken wings

Trent Grisham and Ben Rice fill in while Cody Bellinger is out

New York Yankees outfielder Cody Bellinger wasn't found in Tuesday's game against the Detroit Tigers' lineup. There was no explanation initially for him missing the lineup, and it had fans scratching their heads trying to make sense of it all. As the game drew closer, manager Aaron Boone revealed the surprising reason for Bellinger's absence. It all started when he ate something the night before.Last Monday night, April 7, 2025, Cody Bellinger ate chicken wings for dinner. Already in the early morning of Tuesday, April 8, he began to feel ill. Vomiting all night, New York Yankees manager Aaron Boone reported. The team believes that he got food poisoning after consuming the chicken wings on Monday night. Aaron Boone informed the journalists before Tuesday's game in Comerica Park in Detroit, Michigan.Boone supplemented, "Hopefully he's feeling a little bit better now, and we'll see if we can get him going and make him available as the game goes."Even though Cody Bellinger's condition did not improve in time for the game, the team hopes he will return soon.This condition coincides with a difficult stretch already for Bryant Bellinger. The 28-year-old left-fielder also missed Friday, April 4, and Saturday, April 5, of the Yankees' two-game series against the Pittsburgh Pirates because of a sore back.Now, just a few days back from returning, food poisoning has benched him once more. The Yankees have not shown that he will be available for the team's next game, but he is under close observation by the medical staff of the team.Manager Aaron Boone did mention that none of the other members of the team had any illness, and the rest of the roster was fine. The food seems to have affected Bellinger alone.While Cody Bellinger was out of action, Trent Grisham began in center field. This was Grisham's sixth straight game there. But he would have been in the lineup regardless, as the Yankees were facing Tigers left-handed starter Tarik Skubal.Ben Rice also got some time on the field, becoming the designated hitter. The left-handed batter had to deal with a tough left-on-left matchup against Skubal, but the team believed he was capable of handling it.The Yankees will just keep watching Cody Bellinger's health and see how he's doing before they make any decision on when he'll return to the lineup. At the moment, the team is merely trying to keep the roster healthy and adjust as needed.Also Read: Will Cody Bellinger Play Today Against Detroit Tigers? Latest Update On New York Yankees Star's Injury Report (April 7, 2025)
Article Summary: Cody bellinger misses yankees game after food poisoning from bad wings. The team believes that he got food poisoning after consuming the chicken wings on monday night. The yankees have not shown that he will be available for the team's next game, but he is under close observation.

Article Title: Kevin Hart: “Wait, isn’t that illegal?”: Fans ask as Kevin Hart buys two eagles and names them after Jalen Hurts and Saquon Barkley
Article Text:
Gareth Cattermole/Getty Images

actual eagles

Kevin Hart says he bought eagles for Saquon Barkley and Jalen Hurts and fans

buying two actual eagles

Hot Ones

“I hope that’s just PR, and he’s doing a really good job,”

“I hope he did not spend that money on eagles.”

picked him up off the ground

“He’s a small human being and eagles are strong animals, so I really wouldn’t be surprised,”

“If that’s real, I think I got to go meet them... take a picture with Saquon.”

When it comes to repping the Eagles, Kevin Hart might’ve just out-fanned every fan on Earth—possibly even the ones in shoulder pad costumes at Lincoln Financial. The Philly-born comedian took his Birds loyalty to the next level, and now even Saquon Barkley is stunned. Why? Because Kevin didn’t just cop some Eagles merch or post a hype video. He bought two—yes, the real, flying, majestic kind—and named one of them after Saquon Barkley himself. We’ve officially reached a level of fandom where celebrities aren’t just cheering from the sidelines… they’re forming personal relationships with birds of prey. Welcome to 2025, folks.It’s no secret Kevin Hart bleeds green for the Philadelphia Eagles , but ahead of the Super Bowl, he proved it in the most extra way possible—byand naming them after quarterback Jalen Hurts and new running back Saquon Barkley.In true Kevin Hart fashion, he dropped the news on Instagram, saying he went all in for his beloved Birds. The price tag reportedly ran into the millions, but Hart didn’t flinch. His reasoning? The Eagles were headed for greatness, and he wanted to cement his own legacy in the most Philly way possible.During his recent appearance on, Saquon Barkley was confronted with the eagle-naming news—and let’s just say, he’s hoping Hart didn’t actually spend millions on live birds.Barkley said, visibly amused.But he didn’t stop there. Saquon doubled down on the humor when referencing Hart’s own claim that one of the eaglesBarkley joked.But now, fans on X are raising a valid question: Isn’t owning an eagle extremely illegal? Under the Bald and Golden Eagle Protection Act, private ownership of eagles is banned in the U.S. without a federal permit—and violations can lead to heavy fines or jail time. So unless Hart is housing them through a licensed sanctuary or facility, the stunt might be more symbolic than literal.Still, the internet ran with the idea. From memes of Hart soaring with wings to eagle-sized respect for his dedication to the Philadelphia Eagles, the stunt has become a viral moment.Also read - NFL fans explode over Travis Kelce vs. Rob Gronkowski debate: who’s the real tight end GOAT? Whether real or just a hilarious exaggeration, one thing’s for sure—Kevin Hart is living in full Eagles Super Bowl glory, and Barkley’s taking it all in with a healthy dose of curiosity and side-eye.
Article Summary: Kevin hart says he bought eagles for saquon barkley and jalen hurts. He named one of the eagles after barkley himself. The eagles are headed to the super bowl this weekend in new jersey. But is it illegal to own an eagle in the u.s?

Article Title: Wayne Gretzky’s daughter Paulina Gretzky shares an update from her life as her father gets a standing ovation at Capitals vs. Blackhawks game
Article Text:
Image via Ryan Remiorz/CP

Wayne Gretzky’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, looks stunning in new pictures from LIV Golf Miami



Image via Paulina Gretzky/Instagram

Wayne Gretzky ’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has turned her full attention towards her husband. Her father was recently spotted at the match between the Chicago Blackhawks and the Washington Capitals as Alex Ovechkin made a new record by scoring his 894th goal, repeating what the NHL legend did decades ago. While Paulina Gretzky has not commented on that yet, she recently shared an update from her life.Wayne Gretzky’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, posted a stunning picture of herself on her Instagram story. Paulina Gretzky looked beautiful in a white coloured short dress that she paired with white sneakers.Paulina Gretzky kept her hair open and went for a nude makeup look and opted for a white coloured bag to complete her look. Currently, Paulina Gretzky is at LIV Miami Golf where she is supporting her husband, professional golfer Dustin Johnson .Wayne Gretzky’s daughter, Paulina Gretzky, has kept herself away from all the controversies that her father faced since the 4 Nations Face Off’s final match.Recently, the NHL legend, Wayne Gretzky, spoke about Alex Ovechkin making the same record as he did years ago. Wayne Gretzky said, “I wish the Islanders and the New York fans all the best, but we’re here today to celebrate this guy here, number 8.”The NHL legend added, “I can tell you firsthand I know how hard it is to get to 894, 895 is pretty special. They say records are meant to be broken, but I’m not sure who’s gonna get more goals than that.”Wayne Gretzky also made an appearance on TNT and said, “I was really happy for him, I felt like I scored the goal, does that make any sense? I know the pressure he was under, the microscope he was under, honestly I was relieved”.The NHL legend received a standing ovation from the crowd at the match as soon as fans spotted him. While many fans were expecting Wayne Gretzky to address the controversy he had found himself in a few weeks ago, he remained silent about it. This has confused fans a bit.Also Read: Brad Marchand caught on video making controversial comment to Ottawa Senators player sparking an uproar
Article Summary: Paulina gretzky is at liv miami golf supporting her husband, professional golfer dustin johnson. Her father was recently spotted at the match between the chicago blackhawks and the washington capitals as alex ovechkin made a new record by scoring his 894th goal. While paulina has not commented on that yet, she recently shared an update from her life.

Article Title: LeBron James' injury report (April 8, 2025): Is the Los Angeles Lakers star playing tonight against the OKC Thunder?
Article Text:
Is LeBron James playing tonight? (Image via: Tim Nwachukwu/ Getty Images)

Los Angeles Lakers

LeBron James

Will LeBron James play tonight against the OKC Thunder? Los Angeles Lakers injury report for tonight’s game (April 8, 2025)

Lakers’ performance so far in this season

Theface potential setbacks as Luka Doncic , and Austin Reaves were all listed as questionable for Tuesday’s game against the Oklahoma City Thunder. The trio’s status raises concerns as the Lakers prepare for a critical back-to-back, including a high-profile matchup against the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday. LeBron James is listed as probable for tonight’s game. So, there is some uncertainty surrounding tonight’s game against the OKC Thunder. Luka Doncic is also listed as questionable. Austin Reaves, Dorian Finney-Smith, Gabe Vincent, and Bronny James are also dubious, in addition to James and Doncic. Maxi Kleber, who has not yet made his Los Angeles Lakers debut, and Rui Hachimura have been ruled out. It appears likely that important players will be rested against the Thunder because the game is the first of a back-to-back, followed by a crucial game against the Dallas Mavericks.With four games remaining in the regular season, the Lakers are currently 48-30 and the third seed in the Western Conference. Maintaining their lead over the Denver Nuggets (1.5 games back) and Los Angeles Clippers (2 games back) is crucial for playoff seeding, even though it seems improbable that they can catch the Houston Rockets for the No. 2 seed.LeBron James, Luka Doncic, and Austin Reaves played crucial roles in Sunday’s win over the Thunder, combining for 69 points. Doncic led the charge with 30 points, seven rebounds, and six assists, while LeBron James contributed 19 points and seven assists. Reaves added 20 points, including four three-pointers. Despite their strong performances, the Los Angeles Lakers may opt to rest one or more of them to prioritize Wednesday’s game in Dallas.The Mavericks matchup holds extra significance for Doncic, marking his first return to Dallas since joining the Lakers. Emotions are expected to run high, especially with former Laker Anthony Davis now anchoring the Mavericks’ lineup. Teammates have acknowledged the importance of the game for Doncic, hinting at a possible strategic rest against the Thunder.The Los Angeles Lakers will go to Dallas to play Doncic's old squad following the Thunder matchup. Since this will be Doncic's first time playing for his old team in front of Dallas supporters, the game will be worth seeing.Also read: Will Luka Doncic play tonight against the OKC Thunder? Latest update on the Los Angeles Lakers star's injury report (April 8, 2025) With playoff implications on the line, the Lakers’ decision on Tuesday could hinge on long-term strategy. Fans and analysts will watch closely for updates as tip-off approaches.
Article Summary: Lebron james, luka doncic, and austin reaves are all listed as questionable for tuesday’s game against the oklahoma city thunder. Maxi kleber, who has not yet made his los angeles lakers debut, and rui hachimura have been ruled out. It appears likely that important players will be rested against the thunder because the game is the first of a back-to-back.

Article Title: Alex Ovechkin's wife Anastasia Shubskaya gets $280K diamond ring from Wayne Gretzky’s wife after record-breaking goal
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin with wife Anastasia Shubskaya, former NHL player Wayne Gretzky, and Gretzky's wife Janet Jones after scoring his 895th career goal (via Getty Images)


A goal for the ages: Alex Ovechkin breaks Wayne Gretzky's 26-year record FULL Alex Ovechkin Celebration Ceremony After Record-Breaking Goal No. 895 A legacy passed down: Anastasia Shubskaya receives diamond tribute from Janet Gretzky After Alex Ovechkin netted his 895th career goal and broke legendary Wayne Gretzky 's record, Janet Gretzky showed respect to a time-honored hockey tradition by gifting Anastasia Shubskaya , wife of Alex Ovechkin, an eight-carat diamond ring that had been estimated at $280,000. The Capitals may have lost to the New York Islanders by a score of 4-1, but the outcome was an afterthought to a night all about legacy, love, and a new chapter in hockey's history.The moment of history arrived at 7:26 of the second period. Alex Ovechkin let go of a blazing shot through fellow Russian Ilya Sorokin, making himself the NHL's all-time leading goal scorer. Fans inside UBS Arena lost their minds, and Alex Ovechkin commemorated the occasion by executing a belly flop onto the ice—celebrating his big achievement.While Alex Ovechkin was absorbing the enormity of his achievement, Anastasia Shubskaya was gifted a symbolic token of the historic night. Continuing a tradition started in 1994, when Colleen Howe (wife of Gordie Howe) gave Janet Gretzky a diamond ring after her husband, Wayne Gretzky, broke Colleen Howe’s husband’s record, Janet Gretzky ensured history repeated itself—this time from one hockey family to another.In an interview with the media, Wayne Gretzky said, “A month ago, my wife said, ‘You know, Colleen Howe started a tradition. I’m not sure if anyone is going to break Alex’s record, but I want to give her (Ovechkin’s wife, Anastasia Shubskaya) something really unique.’ So, we went out and she picked out an eight-diamond ring for Alex’s wife. Not only do hockey guys pass down traditions. So do the families and wives.”The act not only spanned generations of greatness but also underlined the strong relationship between hockey families across generations.Also read: “Now the real stuff is coming”: Alex Ovechkin skips The Tonight Show appearance to stay playoff-ready Even though the Capitals fell on the evening, the larger context is one of hope. The team had already secured a playoff berth and now has the emotional tailwind of reaching a once-a-generation milestone. With the NHL playoffs coming, Alex Ovechkin and the Washington Capitals aim to ride the wave of history toward what would be a fairy tale conclusion to the 2025 campaign.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin scored his 895th career goal, breaking wayne gretzky's 26-year record. The washington capitals lost to the new york islanders by a score of 4-1. The capitals had already secured a playoff berth and now has the emotional tailwind of reaching a once-a-generation milestone.

Article Title: Will Vladimir Guerrero Jr. play tonight against Boston Red Sox? Latest update on Toronto Blue Jays star's injury report (April 8, 2025)
Article Text:
Will Vladimir Guerrero Jr. play tonight against Boston Red Sox? Latest update on Toronto Blue Jays star's injury report (Image Source: Getty)

Is Vladimir Guerrero Jr. in action to take the field tonight? Latest updates on Toronto Blue Jays’ Vladimir Guerrero Jr.'s fitness

The Boston Red Sox injury report: Here’s who might miss the action against the Toronto Blue Jays

Is Vladimir Guerrero Jr. ready to outshine tonight against the Boston Red Sox is something that is going to change the score of the team. One of the powerful four-game series between the hosting team, the Boston Red Sox, and the Toronto Blue Jays is on the go. The teams are ready to tackle each other in the second match on 8th April 2025, to be held at 6:45 p.m. ET at Fenway Park in Boston.The local channels like NESN, SNET, and ESPN are responsible for covering the match live from the play area so that fans can enjoy the match from their home. However, there are certain restrictions on certain online streaming platforms, and there is no confirmation on the live streaming.The all-rounder and one of the longest MLB players of the Toronto Blue Jays, Vladimir Guerrero Jr., is highly predicted to be in the game tonight against the Boston Red Sox. The team is going to face the Boston Red Sox tonight, and they are in full swing to outshine them on the field. The match is going to be hosted by the Boston Red Sox at their home place.Vladimir Guerrero Jr has been giving an excellent performance in the recent matches of the MLB opening season, and as per the reports, no injury has been sustained by him to be sidelined from tonight’s game. The performance of Vladimir Guerrero Jr, along with Bo Bichette, is certainly going to leave a strong impact on the future of the team.The lineup of the Boston Red Sox could change last-minute as certain players like Connor Wong, who was actively participating in the opening season, is sidelined till the middle of May. Further, the pitcher of the team, Lucas Giolito, might be out from the game as he has been assigned to rehab, and Miguel Bleis might also be sidelined after sustaining a minor quadriceps injury.Other players such as Matt Moore, Chris Murphy, Liam Hendriks, and Patrick Sandoval are assigned on the injured list, however, their inclusion in the lineup is yet to be announced by the team ahead of the matchAlso Read: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. signs $500 million extension deal with Toronto Blue Jays: Report
Article Summary: Vladimir guerrero jr. has been giving an excellent performance in the recent matches of the mlb opening season, and as per the reports, no injury has been sustained by him to be sidelined from tonight’s game. The team is going to face the boston red sox tonight, and they are in full swing to outshine them on the field.

Article Title: Former India cricketer set to join BJP
Article Text:
Kedar Jadhav joins BJP.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

MUMBAI: Former Indian cricketer Kedar Jadhav has embarked on a new journey into the political arena. On Tuesday afternoon, the 40-year-old formally joined the Bharatiya Janata Party BJP ) at the party headquarters here at the Nariman Point, marking the start of his political career.Also See: CSK vs PBKS Live Sore, IPL 2025 Jadhav, who played for Maharashtra in domestic cricket and Chennai Super Kings in the IPL, was welcomed into the party fold in the presence of BJP's state president Chandrashekhar Bawankule and senior leader Ashok Chavan."I bow down to Chhatrapati Shivaji. Under (PM, Narendra) Modi ji and (Maharashtra) CM (Devendra) Fadnavis. The BJP is doing politics of development. With this said, I under Bawankule enter and join the BJP," Jadhav said on the occasion. "It's a day of happiness for us. In all spheres of life, he has had an impact. I welcome him home. Besides him, several other people have also joined us from Hingoli and Nanded," Bawankule said."He is a fine human being and a good cricketer. He is here for Modi ji and for a Viksit Bharat. He has many fans, people like him are strengthening our party. I truly thank him. He is a national icon with several fans and followers. His followers will also like it that he came for Viksit Maharashtra. He has joined us for state's and country's development. He said that he will inspire the youth, who will also want to join our party.”Born on March 26, 1985, in Pune, Maharashtra, Jadhav, a prolific middle-order batter, made his One Day International (ODI) debut for India in 2014 against Sri Lanka and went on to represent the country in 73 ODIs, scoring 1,389 runs at an average of 42.09. and picking up 27 wickets at an economy rate of 5.15 with his effective part-time off-spinners.While he played a few crucial knocks for India, Jadhav is best remembered for his magnificent 120-run knock off just 76 balls against England in the Pune ODI in 2017, during which, rescuing India from 63 for four in the 12th over, he shared an epic 200-run partnership with the then Indian captain Virat Kohli to help India chase down 351 and carve out a thrilling victory.Jadhav was a mainstay in the Maharashtra side and had a prolific 2013-14 Ranji Trophy season, during which he amassed 1223 runs@87.35, including six hundreds, to force his way into the national team.Jadhav played for four franchises in the IPL - Delhi Daredevils, Royal Challengers Bangalore, Chennai Super Kings, and Sunrisers Hyderabad. Jadhav also played for the now-defunct Kochi Tuskers Kerala in 2010.On June 3, 2024, Jadhav officially announced his retirement from all formats of cricket, closing a chapter that had spanned almost 17 years - 2007-08 to 2024.
Article Summary: Kedar jadhav formally joined the bharatiya janata party bjp on tuesday. The 40-year-old played for maharashtra in domestic cricket and chennai super kings in the ipl. He made his one day international (odi) debut for india in 2014 against sri lanka.

Article Title: New Record! MS Dhoni hits new IPL milestone, becomes first player to ...
Article Text:
MS Dhoni (BCCI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Most Catches in IPL by Wicket-keepers



MS Dhoni: 150 catches

Dinesh Karthik: 137 catches

Wriddhiman Saha: 87 catches

Rishabh Pant: 76 catches

Quinton de Kock: 66 catches

Poll Who do you think is the closest competitor to Dhoni in the IPL as a wicket-keeper? Quinton de Kock Rishabh Pant Wriddhiman Saha Dinesh Karthik

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings veteran MS Dhoni has added yet another feather to his already illustrious cap, becoming the first wicket-keeper in IPL history to complete 150 catches behind the stumps.The 43-year-old legend achieved this remarkable feat during Chennai Super Kings' clash against Punjab Kings in Mullanpur on Tuesday.The historic moment came when Dhoni pouched a sharp edge from Nehal Wadhera off the bowling of Ravichandran Ashwin.It was classic Dhoni. With this, the CSK veteran continued to set new benchmarks, further cementing his legacy as not just a game-changing batter but also the most consistent and impactful wicket-keeper the IPL has ever seen.Even as Punjab Kings posted a daunting 219/6, largely thanks to Priyansh Arya’s record-breaking 103 off 42 balls, Dhoni's sharp glovework stood out in a game where bowlers were under siege.Having already retired from international cricket, Dhoni’s continued excellence in the IPL has become the stuff of legend.Whether it’s his lightning-quick stumpings, match-winning cameos, or tactical brilliance from behind the stumps, Dhoni proves that age is just a number.This latest achievement adds to a long list of records, including most dismissals by a wicket-keeper in the IPL.At 43, Dhoni remains the heartbeat of CSK, and his fitness and reflexes show no signs of fading.While young guns like Priyansh Arya lit up the scoreboard, it was Dhoni who made history once again with his gloves.In a game filled with fireworks, it was a quiet piece of brilliance behind the stumps that reminded everyone why Dhoni is, and will always be, one of the greatest to ever play the game.
Article Summary: Ms dhoni becomes first wicket-keeper in ipl history to complete 150 catches behind the stumps. The 43-year-old legend achieved this remarkable feat during chennai super kings' clash against punjab kings in mullanpur on tuesday. The historic moment came when dhoni pouched a sharp edge from nehal wadhera off the bowling of ravichandran ashwin.

Article Title: Hardik Pandya turns emotional after MI's 4th IPL 2025 loss, gets consoled by brother Krunal
Article Text:
New Delhi:

Poll Which Pandya brother do you think had a bigger impact on the match? Krunal Pandya Hardik Pandya

When will CSK legend MS Dhoni retire from IPL? Astrologer Greenstone Lobo predicts

It has been a case of 'so near, yet so far' for Mumbai Indians (MI) who suffered their fourth loss in five IPL 2025 matches following a defeat against RCB at the Wankhede Stadium in Mumbai. RCB recorded their first win at the Wankhede in 10 years.Also See: IPL Live Score, PBKS vs CSK MI captain Hardik Pandya was left emotional following the close loss by 12 runs, which resulted in his team dropping down to the eighth spot on the points table. Hardik's brother and RCB all-rounder Krunal Pandya was seen consoling him following the defeat with the duo seen sharing a long hug before the post-match presentation. The brothers were later seen interacting on the ground."We knew only one (Pandya) would win. But the love and affection we have for each other is very natural. He batted well. We both wanted to win. I feel for him," said Krunal during the post-match interaction.Interestingly, Krunal delivered the final nail in his former team's coffin, defending 19 runs off the final over. The all-rounder accounted for the dismissals of Mitchell Santner and Deepak Chahar off the first two deliveries, maintaining a tight line and length off the remaining deliveries as well. Hardik was seen smiling initially during the final over. However, he soon seemed stunned as the momentum of the match turned steadily in RCB's favour."We fell short by two hits, don't know what to say. It came down to execution," stated Hardik.Both the Pandya brothers emerged as star performers, making their presence felt. Hardik chipped in with a 15-ball 42, accounting for two dismissals as well. Krunal broke the backbone of the MI chase, picking four wickets. MI will look to make amends after suffering their second straight loss by the same margin of runs.
Article Summary: Mi suffered their fourth loss in five ipl matches following a defeat against rcb. Rcb recorded their first win at the wankhede in 10 years. Mi captain hardik pandya was left emotional following the close loss by 12 runs. Krunal delivered the final nail in his former team's coffin.

Article Title: Digvesh Rathi shows off new celebration after hero Sunil Narine's wicket - Watch
Article Text:
Digvesh Rathi shows off new celebration (screengrab)

Poll Do you believe Rathi's previous celebrations were too provocative? No, they were fine Yes, definitely

NEW DELHI: Lucknow Super Giants ' rising spinner Digvesh Rathi made headlines once again, not just for his bowling but for his unique way of celebrating after dismissing none other than his cricketing idol, Sunil Narine During a high-octane clash against Kolkata Knight Riders at Eden Gardens, Rathi picked up the prized wicket of Narine and followed it up with a brand-new celebration.Also See: IPL Live Score, CSK vs PBKS In the 7th over of KKR's innings, Rathi bowled a deceptive googly that lured Narine into a mistimed big shot.Narine couldn’t get the power he needed, and Aiden Markram ran in from long-off to complete a clean sliding catch.What followed was a moment of maturity and restraint from Rathi, who has come under fire for his earlier, more provocative ‘notebook’ celebration.This time, instead of mimicking writing, Rathi bent down and theatrically signed the grass, perhaps symbolising a respectful autograph or signature moment rather than a taunt.Watch:The wicket was extra special for Rathi, who has publicly admired Narine and even styled parts of his bowling around the West Indian all-rounder.Fans and cricket experts watching the game picked up on the emotional significance, with social media quickly buzzing about the symbolism of a young bowler dismissing his hero.While Rathi’s celebratory antics have previously landed him in hot water -- including fines totaling over Rs 5.6 lakh and multiple demerit points, the gesture this time seemed playful but far less confrontational.With a number of crucial wickets already in IPL 2025 and becoming a reliable option for Rishabh Pant in crunch situations, Rathi is fast becoming one of the most exciting young spinners in the league.
Article Summary: Digvesh rathi shows off new celebration after dismissing sunil narine. Rathi bowled a deceptive googly that lured narine into a mistimed big shot. The wicket was extra special for rathi, who has publicly admired narine and even styled parts of his bowling around the west indian all-rounder.

Article Title: UFC fighter Diana Belbiță announces sudden retirement: “It was fun fighting at the highest level”
Article Text:
Photo by Louis Grasse/ Getty Images

Warrior Princess’ Diana Belbiță ends her 10-Year MMA journey

Diana Belbiță never planned on getting this far. That’s what makes her journey so easy to root for. She didn’t grow up dreaming about the UFC or imagining walkouts under the bright lights. But somehow, she made it—fought in Europe’s toughest promotions, stepped into the Octagon eight times, and left it all in there every single night. And now, at 28, she’s calling it a career. No big sendoff, no spotlight. Just a quiet, honest post on social media, reflecting on a ride she never expected. Diana Belbiță ’s pro career started in 2014, mostly under the radar in Romania. She wasn’t hyped as a phenom. She wasn’t fast-tracked. But she fought often, stayed consistent, and eventually caught the attention of KSW—one of Europe’s most respected MMA promotions. That’s where she had her first real breakthrough, even fighting for a title before heading to the UFC.Her run in the UFC wasn’t perfect. It wasn’t supposed to be. She went 2-6 over six years, picking up wins against Hannah Goldy in 2021 and Maria Oliveira in 2023. She lost some tough ones, including her last three, with her final appearance ending in a submission loss to Dione Barbosa this past weekend.A few days later, she posted a simple message on X.“It was fun fighting at the highest level,” she wrote. “I never even dared to dream that I will get there, but I ended up spending my last 6 years fighting for the best promotion in the world. It was a fun journey and I loved it. Now it’s time for me to start a new chapter.”That last part hits hardest. Not everyone who makes it to the UFC feels like they belong. For Belbiță, just being there meant everything. She wasn’t chasing belts—she was chasing something bigger than that. She was proving to herself that she could stand among the best.Her second-to-last fight came against Molly McCann, another gritty veteran who recently retired herself. There’s something fitting about that—two fighters who gave it their all, even when the wins didn’t come easy, stepping away on their own terms.Also Read: Michal Oleksiejczuk Teams Up with The Fighting Nerds Ahead of UFC 314 Fight vs. Sedriques Dumas Diana Belbiță won’t go down as a UFC legend. But she showed up. She kept going when the odds weren’t in her favor. And for six years, she did something she never even thought was possible. That matters. That sticks with people. Her record won’t tell the full story—but her journey will.
Article Summary: Diana belbiță is retiring after a 10-year mma career. She fought in europe's toughest promotions, including ksw and ufc. Her final fight ended in a submission loss to dione barbosa this past weekend.

Article Title: Derrick Henry’s new look shocks fans as speculation grows about his future with the Baltimore Ravens
Article Text:
Image via Nathan Ray Seebeck-Imagn Images

Derrick Henry debuts a new look that has shocked fans amidst speculations of a contract extension with the Baltimore Ravens



Derrick Henry is dedicating all his time to being prepared for the upcoming season of the NFL



Derrick Henry, the star player of the Baltimore Ravens , is now spending all his time in the offseason working out and keeping himself fit. But it seems like the star player is also trying on a new look, and fans are here for it. Recently, Derrick Henry shared a post on his Instagram story, and it's safe to say that fans are going insane about it.Derrick Henry took to his Instagram to share a post made by the famous, celebrity favourite luxury men’s resale store 4G. The post has the Baltimore Ravens’ Derrick Henry trying on a new look and posing with a key member of the luxurious brand.Derrick Henry poses in a black shirt that he has paired with a long black coloured jacket. The star player opted for black pants that had quirky designs on them. He was also spotted carrying two bags - a black coloured bag that had the words, “Go f**k yourself” printed on it while the other bag was a green coloured bag.Derrick Henry also wore a silver necklace along with silver rings and a watch. To complete his look, the star player opted for black coloured shoes that had a hint of pink colour to it.Derrick Henry’s new look has shocked his fans but they are here for it. A fan commented, “puttin this pic on a frame fr”, while another fan wrote, “crazy collab”.The luxurious brand 4G has made a name for itself among celebrities. The store has been previously visited by the famous rapper Drake and by other NFL players, including the New York Giants’ wide receiver, Odell Beckham Jr.In the last few weeks, Derrick Henry’s gruelling workout videos have gone viral. In one video, Derrick Henry was seen going uphill as he was chained and this has impressed his fans.Currently, there are a lot of speculations around Derrick Henry’s extension with the Baltimore Ravens.As per a transcript via the Baltimore Ravens, coach John Harbaugh spoke about Derrick Henry’s contract extension and said, “It's definitely in the conversation. I know that's been talked about, and yes, I'd love to see that get done as well."The Athletic’s Jeff Zrebiec posted an update on X which read as, “Harbaugh said that he'd like the team to extend RB Derrick Henry who is in last year of deal.”However, neither the Baltimore Ravens nor Derrick Henry has reacted to all the speculations yet. Fans are hoping that the Baltimore Ravens extend their contract with Derrick Henry due to his consistent strong performance.Also Read: Derrick Henry’s new workout video goes viral but fans are focused on someone else in the video
Article Summary: Derrick henry is dedicating all his time to being prepared for the upcoming season. The star player of the baltimore ravens is also trying on a new look. Recently, derrick henry shared a post on his instagram story, and it's safe to say that fans are going insane about it.

Article Title: Shardul Thakur bowls five consecutive wides, leaves Rishabh Pant frustrated
Article Text:
Shardul Thakur bowls five consecutive wides, leaves Rishabh Pant frustrated (Screengrabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Should Rishabh Pant have taken a review for the wide calls? No, it wouldn't have changed anything Yes, it was worth a try

NEW DELHI: It was a bizarre and frustrating sequence at the Eden Gardens on Tuesday as Shardul Thakur delivered five consecutive wides in a single ball (the first of the 13th over) during KKR ’s steep run chase against Lucknow Super Giants .The moment left Lucknow Super Giants skipper Rishabh Pant visibly exasperated behind the stumps, even showing his frustration with his decision not to take a review for a wide call as things unraveled before him.Also See: CSK vs PBKS Live Score, IPL 2025 With KKR needing 90 off 48 balls, Thakur was handed the ball in a crucial phase.But instead of applying pressure, he quite literally released it -- again and again, far outside the off-stump.All five attempts were wide yorkers, and all five missed the mark, each sailing past a disinterested Ajinkya Rahane The fifth wide was the worst of the lot -- outside the tramline that even skipper Pant was left frustrated as he ended up rejecting Thakur's request for a review.What added to the irony, however, was that the over ended with a wicket -- Rahane, who had anchored the innings with a fluent 61 off 35 balls, mistimed a full toss straight to Nicholas Pooran at deep midwicket.Thakur, after all the drama, had his man.While Thakur did eventually get the breakthrough, the damage from the extras couldn’t be ignored.Against a team that had posted a colossal 238/3 thanks to fireworks from Pooran, Marsh, and Markram, such loose bowling only gave KKR more breathing room during their steep chase.
Article Summary: Shardul thakur bowls five consecutive wides, leaves rishabh pant frustrated. Kkr were chasing 90 off 48 balls against lucknow super giants. All five attempts were wide yorkers, and all five missed the mark. The fifth wide was the worst of the lot -- outside the tramline.

Article Title: Aggressive Khaleel Ahmed roars at Shreyas Iyer in animated send-off
Article Text:
Khaleel Ahmed roars at Shreyas Iyer (Screengrabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll How crucial was Khaleel Ahmed's wicket of Shreyas Iyer for CSK's performance? Not crucial at all Somewhat crucial Extremely crucial

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings pacer Khaleel Ahmed brought pure fire to the field during his side’s clash against Punjab Kings as he dismissed Shreyas Iyer with a sizzling delivery and then celebrated with raw emotion.The moment unfolded in the third over of the PBKS innings, just as Iyer was beginning to find his rhythm.Also See: IPL Live Score, CSK vs PBKS Having smacked a gorgeous six over long-on just two balls earlier, Iyer looked set for a big score.But Khaleel had other ideas. Charging in with intensity, he delivered a full-length ball that tailed in just enough to exploit a slight gap between bat and pad.The off-stump was sent cartwheeling, leaving Iyer stunned and the Chandigarh crowd momentarily silent.But what followed was just as eye-catching as the dismissal.Khaleel, pumped and brimming with adrenaline, let out a primal roar in Iyer’s direction in a fiery, animated celebration.The raw emotion, the energy -- it was a moment that fired up the entire CSK camp.This wasn’t the first time Khaleel had bested Iyer.The left-arm pacer has now dismissed the PBKS captain three times in seven IPL innings, keeping him to just 33 runs off 24 balls.Clearly, he has Iyer’s number.It was a crucial wicket too, as Iyer’s quickfire nine off seven had begun to shift momentum back to Punjab after the early loss of Prabhsimran Singh.But Khaleel’s breakthrough and his celebration made sure the pressure stayed firmly on the batting side.Despite an expensive first over where he went for 17 runs, Khaleel bounced back strongly.His ability to recover, strike at key moments, and bring passion to the pitch continues to make him a vital asset for Chennai.
Article Summary: Khaleel ahmed dismissed shreyas iyer with a sizzling delivery and then celebrated with raw emotion. The moment unfolded in the third over of the pbks innings. Khaleel, pumped and brimming with adrenaline, let out a primal roar in iyer’s direction in a fiery, animated celebration.

Article Title: Watch: Preity Zinta's wild celebration breaks the internet as Priyansh Arya smashes record ton vs CSK
Article Text:
Preity Zinta's wild celebration breaks the internet (Screengrabs)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What was your reaction to Priyansh Arya's incredible century? Indifferent Expected it Excited Amazed

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings dugout erupted with emotion on Tuesday evening as 24-year-old Priyansh Arya lit up the Mullanpur stadium with a jaw-dropping century against Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in IPL 2025.But it was co-owner Preity Zinta ’s reaction that captured the hearts of fans as she jumped in celebration, visibly overjoyed at Arya’s historic knock.Also See: PBKS vs CSK Live Score, IPL 2025 Arya, a left-handed batter from Delhi, announced himself on the big stage in style, hammering 103 off just 42 balls — a knock studded with seven 4s and nine towering 6s.With this innings, he became the second-fastest Indian to reach a century in IPL history, getting there in just 39 balls. Only Yusuf Pathan’s 37-ball carnage in 2010 stands ahead of him.As Arya brought up the milestone with a powerful strike over long-on, the camera panned to the Punjab Kings camp, where Preity Zinta could hardly contain her excitement. She leapt to her feet, clapping and cheering, her joy mirrored by fans across the stadium.Watch:This wasn’t just a random explosive innings, it was the culmination of a journey that’s been steadily gaining momentum.Arya first rose to fame in the Delhi Premier League, where he smashed six sixes in an over and scored a blistering 120.His performances earned him a Rs 3.8 crore IPL deal with PBKS -- a huge jump from his base price of Rs 30 lakh.Before the IPL, he had already impressed in domestic cricket, topping the run charts for Delhi in the 2024–25 Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. Even senior players like R Ashwin had taken notice of his fearless shot-making.Born in 2001, Arya is now part of a rare club of uncapped players to score a century in the IPL, joining the likes of Manish Pandey, Devdutt Padikkal, and Yashasvi Jaiswal.With Preity Zinta’s celebration going viral and Arya’s knock now etched in the history books, this was more than just another game.ALSO READ: Who is Priyansh Arya, second-fastest Indian to score IPL century
Article Summary: Punjab kings co-owner preity zinta's reaction to priyansh arya's century goes viral. Arya scored 103 off just 42 balls against chennai super kings in ipl 2025. He is the second-fastest indian to score an ipl century, after yusuf pathan.

Article Title: 'Kuch bolunga toh bawal ho jayega': Ajinkya Rahane reignites Eden Gardens pitch controversy after KKR's loss to LSG
Article Text:
Ajinkya Rahane (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What do you think is the biggest factor for KKR's home losses this season? Other reasons Strong opposition batting Underperforming bowlers Poor pitch conditions

IPL: KKR skipper Ajinkya Rahane slams Eden pitch after defeat to LSG

NEW DELHI: Kolkata Knight Riders captain Ajinkya Rahane expressed dissatisfaction with the pitch at Eden Gardens, noting its lack of assistance for spinners following the team's home defeat.Rahane, while cautious in his remarks, hinted at the potential controversy surrounding discussions of 'home advantage.'The match against Lucknow Super Giants , which ended in a narrow four-run defeat for KKR, marked their second loss in three home games this season.Rahane highlighted the ineffective spin bowling conditions, contrasting with expectations for the match."Firstly, there was no help for the spinners, let me clear that," Rahane said in the post-match press conference. "They used the boundary really well, you know, bowling to the longer end, I mean longer boundary, they did that really well, our bowlers tried as well, but again, (Nicholas) Pooran and Mitchell Marsh batted really well in between, they took their chances which came off really well for them.""It was a lovely wicket, we all saw that, scoring almost 500 runs on this track, hard for the bowlers, but again, they used the conditions and used the boundary really well."The game saw a high-scoring affair with LSG setting a formidable total of 238/3, and KKR falling short at 234/7.Rahane's strategy to bowl first did not yield the desired outcome as the opposition batters, notably Nicholas Pooran and Mitchell Marsh, capitalized on the conditions effectively.KKR's spin duo, Sunil Narine and Varun Chakravarthy, struggled, failing to secure any wickets and conceding runs at a rate of over nine per over.This performance led to questions about the relevance of 'home advantage' in the IPL , a topic Rahane approached with caution to avoid controversy."See, there's been enough talk about the wicket. Aap logon ne bahut usko yeh kar diya hai. Toh agar main abhi kuch bolunga na, toh bawal ho jayega. (You people have already hyped it up a lot. So if I say anything now, it will create a big controversy)," Rahane added."Jo hamare curator hai, unko bahut publicity mila. I think he's happy with that publicity. Home advantage ke baare mein aapko jo likhna hai, aap likh sakto, jo laga. (Our curator has got a lot of publicity. I think he's happy with that publicity. You can write whatever you feel like about the home advantage). If I have any concern, I would probably convey it to the IPL rather than speaking about it here."Regarding his personal performance and aspirations for an India comeback, Rahane said, "I'm really enjoying my cricket at the moment, firstly playing for KKR and playing at the Eden. For me, it's all about staying in the moment, enjoying my cricket, enjoying my batting, and that's it. I don't want to think far too ahead."
Article Summary: Kolkata knight riders captain ajinkya rahane unhappy with pitch at eden gardens. Kkr lost by four runs to lucknow super giants in ipl match. Rahane hints at potential controversy surrounding discussions of 'home advantage' kkr have lost two of their three home games this season.

Article Title: 'I don't cry that easily': Shreyas Iyer reveals the last time he couldn't stop himself
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer (Screengrab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: India's middle-order batter and Punjab Kings skipper Shreyas Iyer experienced an emotional moment during the first practice session of the Champions Trophy 2025, where he found himself in tears due to his inability to perform as expected.Despite coming off a successful series against England, Iyer struggled with his form in the nets, leading to a rare display of vulnerability. This incident marked a significant moment for Iyer, who admitted to rarely crying.Also See: IPL Live Score, MI vs RCB "Last time I cried was during Champions Trophy, first practice session. Like literally crying, crying. Because I batted in the nets, and it didn't go well. I was so angry with myself that I started crying. And I was also shocked at the fact that I don't cry that easily," Shreyas Iyer said on Punjab Kings' show.However, his resilience and ability to quickly understand the playing conditions paid off, as he became a crucial player for India throughout the Champions Trophy. His contribution was particularly notable in the finals, where he scored 48 runs off 62 balls, helping his team in the middle overs.Under Iyer's captaincy, Punjab Kings suffered a heavy 50-run defeat at the hands of Rajasthan Royals in Mullanpur, as their IPL 2025 campaign tasted its first defeat.Chasing a daunting 206, PBKS faltered early with both openers, including captain Shreyas Iyer, dismissed inside the powerplay by a fiery Jofra Archer.Archer finished with 3/25, setting the tone for Rajasthan’s commanding bowling performance.Earlier, Yashasvi Jaiswal starred with the bat, scoring a fluent 67 off 45 balls, supported by Sanju Samson (38) and a late flourish from Riyan Parag (43 not out). Their efforts propelled RR to a formidable 205/4. Despite some resistance in the middle order, PBKS couldn’t recover from early blows and ended at 155/9.The loss raises concerns for Punjab, particularly around their top-order fragility and captain Iyer’s underwhelming form, while Rajasthan Royals regained much-needed momentum and a healthy net run rate boost with the victory.
Article Summary: Shreyas iyer found himself in tears during the first practice session of the champions trophy 2025. Iyer struggled with his form in the nets, leading to a rare display of vulnerability. Punjab kings suffered a heavy 50-run defeat at the hands of rajasthan royals.

Article Title: Memphis Grizzlies vs Charlotte Hornets final injury report (April 8, 2025): Is Ja Morant expected to play tonight?
Article Text:
Is Ja Morant playing tonght? (Image via: Tim Nwachukwu/Getty Images)

Memphis Grizzlies

Ja Morant

Playoff implications and what’s at stake for Memphis Grizzlies

Can Morant lead the Grizzlies to the playoffs?

The Western Conference playoff race remains wide open as thefight to secure their spot. With every game carrying postseason implications, the Grizzlies face the Charlotte Hornets tonight in what should be a must-win matchup. The biggest question looming over the game: Willsuit up after missing the previous contest?Memphis received a scare when their star point guard Ja Morant was ruled out last minute against the Pistons due to food poisoning. However, interim head coach Tuomas Iisalo provided positive updates ahead of tonight’s game.Key takeaways from the injury report:- Ja Morant (food poisoning) – Expected to return- Zyon Pullin (knee injury) – Out- Brandon Clarke (knee) – Out for the seasonMorant’s return is crucial for Memphis, as he leads the team with averages of 22.9 points, 4.2 rebounds, and 7.3 assists per game. His absence was felt, but the Memphis Grizzlies managed back-to-back wins against Miami and Detroit without him.With Morant back in action, Memphis is expected to field a strong starting five. Here’s the projected lineup:Desmond Bane’s recent 38-point explosion against Detroit and rookie Zach Edey’s dominant 21-rebound performance provide additional firepower. The Memphis Grizzlies will rely on their core players to secure a vital road win. The Grizzlies currently hold the 8th seed in the West, making every remaining game critical. Key factors in tonight’s matchup:- The Hornets (19-59) have little to play for besides their final home game.- Memphis must capitalize on weaker opponents to climb the standings.- A win could help them avoid the play-in tournament or secure a better seeding.While Charlotte’s poor record suggests an easy victory, NBA unpredictability means Memphis can’t afford to take anything for granted.Ja Morant’s return provides a major boost, but Memphis must maintain consistency. With only a few games left, each performance could determine their postseason fate. If the Grizzlies play to their potential, they should handle the Hornets, but in this tight Western race, nothing is guaranteed.Also read: Why is LaMelo Ball not playing tonight against the Memphis Grizzlies? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (April 8, 2025) Fans will be watching closely to see if Morant and company can deliver when it matters most.
Article Summary: Memphis grizzlies host charlotte hornets (19-59) in a must-win game for both teams. Grizzlies star point guard ja morant was ruled out last minute due to food poisoning. Zyon pullin and brandon clarke are both ruled out for the season with knee injuries.
